snippet.title: Lloyd the Monkey 2 - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
We've been hard at work on finishing up Lloyd the Monkey 2, so here's a new preview of the game, highlighting new content and a couple of the game's voice actors. We hope you're all looking forward to the final release!

Download the final demo at these links:
https://meyer-games.itch.io/lloyd-the-monkey-2
https://gamejolt.com/games/lloydthemonkey2/417832

Voice of Lloyd: Noah Meyer
Voice of Lura: Abbie Rieber

Lloyd the Monkey 2 releases on August 2 for Windows PC and Mac OS.
